query:
INSERT INTO achievements(
            user_id,
            achievement,
            achieved,
            awarded_at
        ) SELECT
            author as user_id,
            $1,
            true,
            now()
        FROM user_scoring_info_per_language
        WHERE language=$2
        GROUP BY author
        HAVING CAST(SUM(total_score) as BIGINT) > $3
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
